      • playGame

        public boolean playGame()
        Starts the quiz game
        Returns:
        Whether the player wishes to start a new game after this one is over

      • takeTurn

        private void takeTurn(Player player,
                      Question question,
                      int questionNo,
                      int totalQuestions)
        The given player takes a turn at guessing the answer to the question.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who guesses.
        question - The question to guess.
        questionNo - The index of the current question, used to display to how many questions remain. If the question is a stalemate breaker, this isn't displayed to the user.
        totalQuestions - The total amount of questions the player will be asked this session (without stalemate breakers). If the question is a stalemate breaker, this will be ignored.

      • checkQuestionsLeft

        private void checkQuestionsLeft()
        Tells the player when there are no more questions left in the QuestionManager. This should never happen when at least 10 questions are provided.

        private void showResults()
